original_text: When Herod saw Jesus, he was very glad, for he had long desired to see him, because he had heard about him, and he was hoping to see some sign done by him.
korean_text: 헤롯이 예수를 보고 매우 기뻐하니 이는 그의 소문을 들었으므로 보고자 한 지 오래였고 또한 무엇이나 이적 행하심을 볼까 바랐던 연고러라

sentences.original_text: for he had long desired to see him
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 오랫동안 그를 보고 싶어했기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: because he had heard about him
and he was hoping to see some sign done by him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 그가 행하는 어떤 표적을 보기를 바랐다
